short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get a notification for the page your want to revise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension to support users' learning.
By re-notifying added Web pages at regular intervals from a pop-up menu, the system enables users to efficiently memorize the pages.
